Row.Text: Every one sees what you appear to be, few really know what you are. This is as it should be.
Niccolo Machiavelli, at your service. How might you be of service to me? I mean… how might I be of service to you?
Niccolo Machiavelli, at your service. How might you be of service to me? I mean… how might I be of service to you?
Niccolo Machiavelli, at your service. How might you be of service to me? I mean… how might I be of service to you?
To be caught unarmed is the worst fault.
Hahahaha! You think me a fox; I am also a lion.
A struggle. A fall. I am no prince, but only a writer. I return to my writing desk in obscurity.
This works into my plans splendidly.
There is no profit in it.
